pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoDrops Immune Support Blackcurrent 16 Lozenges
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoDrops + Immune Support Blackcurrant Menthol Lozenges with Zinc + Vitamin C.

VICKS VapoDrop + Immune Support lozenges are specially formulated to relieve cough, clear blocked nose and soothe sore throat during cold. It also helps to support immune system health in adults when taken once daily.

Boxed Contents: 16 Blackcurrant menthol lozenges

Size: 16 Pack

Scent: Blackcurrant

KEY FEATURES

• Relieves cough
• Clears blocked nose
• Soothes sore throat
• Supports immune system health

Warnings

Maximum 6 lozenges per day, for not more than 7 consecutive days.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
Do not use if blister seal is broken.

Ingredients

Menthol (10mg), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 33.5mg, Sodium Ascorbate 74.9mg equivalent to Vitamin C 66.5mg, Zinc Gluconate 27.88mg (equivalent to elemental zinc 4mg)

Active Ingredients: Menthol, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Sodium Ascorbate, Zinc Gluconate

Contains: Each lozenge contains: Menthol: 10mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C): 33.5mg, Sodium Ascorbate (equivalent to Vitamin C 66.5 mg): 74.9mg, Zinc Gluconate (equivalent to elemental zinc 4 mg): 27.88mg. Sugars and Sucralose

Directions

Dosage: For cough, blocked nose and sore throat relief: Adults: Take 1 lozenge every 2-3 hours as needed. Maximum 6 lozenges per day, for not more than 7 consecutive days. Children 6 years and above: Take 1 lozenge every 4-6 hours as needed. Maximum 4 lozenges per day, for not more than 7 consecutive days. For immune system health: Adults only: Take 1 lozenge daily.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C
